descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis throws a nice pass to Caris LeVert who goes up and around a defender to get a fast-break bucket for the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sabonis finds LeVert for fast-break bucket) 2021/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sabonis finds LeVert for fast-break bucket

videos.description: Mason Plumlee taps an awkward pass over his head to Jerami Grant outside who knocks down a 3-pointer for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Plumlee uses awkward pass to find Grant for 3) 2021/03/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Plumlee uses awkward pass to find Grant for 3
